Title: Food
Presenters: How to make LN2 Ice Cream
All Day Event: 'Learn the basics of making liquid nitrogen ice cream! Equipment; safety; proportions; how the mix should taste before freezing; pouring; stirring; timing of mix-ins; recipe adjustments for non-dairy and non-sugar alternatives.  Hands-on training as space permits- and of course- ice cream samples will be provided!'

Title: Food
All Day Event: 'Come enjoy LN2 ice cream made for you by our own new group of volunteers!'

Title: Food
All Day Event: 'Watch as Bill and Anthony actually make a two-liter of soda during a live demonstration. They'll explain how to make it- why they use different processes- and take suggestions for flavors from the audience.'
